THE LOBBYING BEHIND THE PIPELINE TRUMP BASHED TODAY: Trump lambasted a gas pipeline project linking Germany and Russia during a breakfast meeting in Brussels this morning, saying “it’s very sad when Germany makes a massive oil and gas deal with Russia, where you’re supposed to be guarding against Russia and Germany goes out and pays billions and billions of dollars a year to Russia.” The company behind the pipeline, Nord Stream 2 AG, is a subsidiary of Gazprom, the Russian gas giant.
